entry.title: Halloween 3-Pack Monster Cereals
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle
Type: Snacks
Price: 24.99

Retro American Cereal

Breakfast of Sweeties

Introduced in Halloween in 1971, this mix of cereal and marshmallows has a distinct chocolate flavour and is only produced by General Mills during the halloween season. Pick yours up today before they run off scared!

entry.title: Fruity Pebbles Marshmallow Cereal
entry.summary:
Vendor: Post
Type: Snacks
Price: 12.49

NEW from Post!

Fruity Pebbles with Marshmallows

Special Edition ✩ American Cereal

Post's Fruity Pebbles with Marshmallows will make Monday mornings worth waking up for! Your favourite breakfast cereal is made of sweetened rice and the delicious addition of colourful marshmallows provides a tasty twist on the original Fruity Pebbles.

If you love Fruity Pebbles cereal & Lucky Charms marshmallows, you will truly appreciate everything about this delicious cereal!

Don't miss out on this special edition of Fruity Pebbles. Order while supplies last!

1 box - 311g

Click here for more cereal varieties!

Specialty Snacks Shipped to Canada & the USA!

Ingredients

Rice, Sugar, Marshmallows (Sugar, Modified Cornstarch, Corn Syrup, Dextrose, Gelatin, Sodium Hexametaphosphate, Yellow 5, Red 40, Blue 1, Yellow 6, Artificial Flavor), Corn Syrup, Canola Oil, Salt, Contains 1% or Less of: Natural and Artificial Flavor, Yellow 5, Yellow 6, Red 40, Blue 1, BHT Added to Preserve Freshness. Vitamins and Minerals: Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), Vitamin A Palmitate, Reduced Iron, Zinc Oxide, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride (Vitamin B6), Riboflavin (Vitamin B2), Thiamin Mononitrate (Vitamin B1), Vitamin D3, Folic Acid, Vitamin B12.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labeling or contact the manufacturer directly for current data. We cannot be held responsible for the accuracy of ingredients or nutritional information provided, nor liable for any reactions caused by the products we sell.

entry.title: Birthday Cake Pebbles Cereal - 10oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Post
Type: Snacks
Price: 11.99

Happy Birthday Pebbles!

There may not be a more iconic cereal! Fruity Pebbles have been putting smiles on kids faces since the 1970s and are now celebrating their 50th birthday! To this day they still feature the original Flinstones characters created by Hanna-Barbera, now owned by Warner Brothers. Enjoy them today in their new birthday cake flavour, a fun and delicious twist on the traditional birthday cake! The new cereal features blue, pink and yellow flakes and a vanilla birthday cake and frosting flavor. Have your cake and eat it too!

Limit 1 Per Customer

 

10oz

entry.title: Kellogg's Together With Pride - 221g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kellogg's
Type: Snacks
Price: 14.99

 "Boxes are for cereal, not people."

This heart-shaped cereal is the embodiment and celebration of Kellogg Company's commitment to diversity, equity and inclusion, not just within Kellogg's Company, but also at the tables of their cereal fans coast to coast. Featuring berry-flavored rainbow hearts dusted with edible glitter! 

 


221g - 7.8oz

entry.title: Dunkin' Mocha Latte Cereal - 11oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Post
Type: Snacks
Price: 11.99

☕ For the Caramel Coffee Lover ☕

    Need that caffeine rush first thing in the morning? Why not make it a sugar rush too! Dip your spoon into this new Dunkin Cereal that was brewed perfectly to give you the rich taste of a delectable Mocha Latte! 

    Crunchy, chocolate cereal pieces and latte-swirled marshmallows create the perfect coffee-flavoured breakfast that you won't be able to stop munching. But it isn't fully complete without milk! Each spoonful will turn into a mocha latte giving you everything you need to start your day properly.

 

11oz / 311g

entry.title: Cocoa Pebbles Cereal Family Size - 20oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Post
Type: Snacks

Cocoa Pebbles

Enjoy this cereal in a larger size! 

Coco Pebbles, also known as the chocolatey brother of Fruity Pebbles have been around just as long and are still just as delicious! These American cereals use to be sold in Canada, but sadly are no longer available at local stores. To this day they still feature the original Flintstones characters that were originally created by Hanna-Barbera and now owned by Warner Brothers.

 

20oz / 581g

entry.title: Space Jam: A New Legacy Limited Edition Cereal - 17oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: General Mills
Type: Snacks

Space Jam: A New Legacy Limited Edition Cereal 

Berry with Marshmallows

🏀Featuring LeBron James🏀

 

Slam dunk with your spoon and welcome to the Jam!

You can now enjoy this epic cereal featuring basketball champion and global icon LeBron James as he goes on an epic adventure alongside timeless Tune Bugs Bunny. Who knows maybe you can beat LeBron and Bugs Bunny by eating your cereal faster than the shot clock!

S'mores Remixed

American Snacks

A snack made for cereal lovers! Introducing Golden Grahams S'mores Remix - embrace the sweet side of beloved cereals by combining them with even more sugary ingredients. entry.title: Dunkaroos Special Edition Cereal
entry.summary:
Vendor: General Mills
Type: Snacks
Price: 12.49

NEW Dunkaroos Cereal

Special Edition Release 

Nostalgic 90's Snack Makes a Comeback!

We know how you feel. We missed Dunkaroos, too. The crisp cookies that you can dunk into delicious frosting has been truly missed by people nation-wide... Now, it's finally our time to relive our childhood! Dunkaroos made a much-needed comeback in December of 2020 to satisfy our cookie-and-frosting cravings!

Just like the OG snack, General Mills has created a vanilla frosting-flavoured cookie cereal with a confetti explosion of rainbow sprinkles in each piece. Perfectly paired with milk! Fill your bowl with nostalgia every morning with Dunkaroos cereal.

Features a 90's Pop Quiz on the backside of the cereal box along with a gallery of "Then" and "Now" items; a comparison of popular items we used in the 1990's versus items we use in 2021. Just in case the nostalgia wasn't enough.

Don't wait any longer - It's time to throw it back to the good old days with this special edition cereal.

*LIMITED QUANTITIES* Order today while supplies last*

entry.title: Sesame Street Cinnamon Cereal - 510g
entry.summary:
Vendor: General Mills
Type: Snacks
Price: 9.36

NEW! Sesame Street Cinnamon Cereal

A to Z Alphabet Letters 

Comes With a Bilingual Storybook!


Monday mornings will never be the same again! Experience a fun and educational breakfast like no other with a lightly sweetened cereal made with whole grains and a touch of cinnamon.

An alternative, delicious way to teach your kids the alphabet! A through Z letter shaped cereal allows for an unmatchable eating & learning experience. With fun activities on the side of the box and a bilingual storybook with pictures attached to the back, children will never say no to breakfast ever again!

Sesame Street Cereal by General Mills is:

  • Nut Free
  • Good source of Calcium and Vitamin D
  • Good source of Vitamin E
  • Good source of fiber 

*While supplies last*

1 family size box - 510g / 1lb 2 oz

Also Available:

Sesame Street 123 Berry Cereal (510g)

Special Edition Cereals Shipped to Canada & USA!

Ingredients

Corn flour blend (whole grain yellow corn flour, degerminated yellow corn flour), sugar, wheat flour, whole grain oat flour, oat fiber, soluble corn fiber, contains 2% or less of salt, enriched flour (wheat flour, niacin, reduced iron, vitamin B1 [thiamin mononitrate], vitamin B2 [riboflavin], folic acid), calcium carbonate, natural flavor, degerminated yellow corn flour, invert sugar, cornstarch, red 40, yellow 5, yellow 6, blue 1, turmeric extract color, color added, BHT for freshness.Vitamins and Minerals: Reduced iron, niacinamide, vitamin B6 (pyridoxine hydrochloride), vitamin B2 (riboflavin), vitamin B1 (thiamin hydrochloride), folic acid, vitamin D3, vitamin B12.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labeling or contact the manufacturer directly for current data. We cannot be held responsible for the accuracy of ingredients or nutritional information provided, nor liable for any reactions caused by the products we sell.

entry.title: Apple Jacks Cereal - 10.1oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kellogg's
Type: Snacks
Price: 11.99

Kellogg's Apple Jacks

American Cereal

Kellogg's Apple Jacks Cereal is a sweetened cereal with Apple & Cinnamon! Apple Jacks has been around since the 1960's but started with a different name called Apple O's. It is one of the most popular cereals in the US, but was only introduced in Canada for a limited time in 2001. Thankfully Candy Funhouse has brought it back for Canadians to enjoy it from sea to shinning sea!

 

10.1oz
